availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Morgan County, Ohio, cabinetmaker. North Carolina native. Son of Jeremiah Patterson and Faith Patterson. Married to Mahala Patterson. Father of Thomas Patterson. Married to Rebecca Williams Patterson in Chesterfield, Ohio, on May 30, 1861. Father of John W. Patterson. Cabinetmaker in Morgan County, Ohio, in 1850. Resident of Chesterfield Township in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Morgan County, Marion Township, p. 154B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Morgan County, Chesterfield, p. 442.
William Wade Hinshaw et al, Encyclopedia of American Quaker Genealogy, 1607-1943, vol. 4 (Baltimore, MD: Genealogical Publishing Company, 1994), p. 1109.
